groups.rationale: The candidate has direct experience building Electron apps using Node.js and integrating APIs, which aligns well with the key criteria for this group.
notableQuotes: I built the Electron app using Node.js and integrated multiple APIs.

groups.rationale: The candidate shares weekly updates and documents decisions to keep stakeholders informed and aligned. This suggests decent communication skills, but more probing may be needed to assess communication in challenging situations.
followUpQuestions: Can you share an example of how you communicated with stakeholders when there was a setback or change in plans?
notableQuotes: For collaboration I share weekly updates and document decisions.

batch.text: I built the Electron app using Node.js and integrated multiple APIs.
For collaboration I share weekly updates and document decisions.

groups.rationale: The candidate not only has experience building Electron apps and integrating APIs, but also implemented streaming analysis capabilities using the Claude API. This demonstrates strong technical skills directly relevant to the role.
notableQuotes: I built the Electron app using Node.js and integrated multiple APIs.
I also added streaming analysis using the Claude API to score transcripts.

groups.rationale: The candidate goes beyond just sharing updates, by providing stakeholders with dashboards and Slack alerts. This proactive, multi-channel approach to communication shows they are skilled at keeping stakeholders well-informed.
notableQuotes: For collaboration I share weekly updates and document decisions.
Stakeholders receive dashboards and Slack alerts.

batch.text: I also added streaming analysis using the Claude API to score transcripts.
